article.title: The Scholar and the Future of the Research Library
article.author: Rider, F.
article.text: Of all the problems which have, of recent years, engaged the attention of educators and librarians none have been more puzzling than those posed by the astonishing growth of our great research libraries. My own interest in this subject has, over several years, resulted in a series of papers, some of them mainly analyzes, but others of them endeavoring to suggest answers to what has sometimes seemed to be an almost insoluble puzzle.
